Github

About

aRchaic is a R/python software package developed by Kushal Dey and Hussein Al Asadi in collaboration with Matthew Stephens and John Novembre. The primary goals of this package are the following

  • Exploratory analysis and powerful visualization of an mutational profiles from a BAM file (applicable for both ancient and modern BAM files)
  • Clustering and summary visualization of a large pool of ancient and modern BAM files, highlighting differences in patterns of mutational features.
  • Classification of ancient and modern BAM files based on mutational profiles.
